name: ShineG Has Nightmares
description:
Currently, the game is under development and will be released soon. If you can't wait, you can make a price wish list first and then look at our two products already on sale.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Shine was caught in an endless nightmare
All the terrible dreams that people dream about are pouring in to Shine.
What should Shine do?
It's easy. Take up arms and do it. The game is expected to have a variety of weapons, pistols, rifles, grenades, rocket launchers, laser cannons, frozen gun. You can use these weapons to the enemy to the flesh and blood flying in all directions.
The game will have a reward system for your game. The higher the score, the more CG will be unlocked, and the CG appreciation function!
P.S: this game will be a system of achievement, and the achievement will not be difficult.
